attributes.action: Remove all music that has racist worlds and refer to women as bithces
attributes.additional_details: Next I believe that this type of language used in a commercial environment is not in the UK guidelines and supports and makes it fine to use words such as N***er and b**he's aswell as help promote drug dealing and gun crime
attributes.background: To ban music which use offensive language and refer to women as bitches (sorry for using that word)

rejection.details:
The UK Government is not responsible for the words which people use.

The Office of Communications (Ofcom) is responsible for regulating the broadcast, telecommunications, and postal service industries in the UK. If you wish to raise a complaint about the use of certain language on TV or in other broadcast media, you can find out how to do so here: https://www.ofcom.org.uk/complaints.
